stories.text: I am increasing my rate. Haven't done so in years. Client is going to be shocked. Project manager said "as long as you can justify it". I could just say "inflation", but I think he means that I link to some published rate metrics. I did some googling and only found an IEEE rate guide - which costs $45. Anyone have some resources to share?
stories.title: Ask HN: Budget season. How to justify rate?

The American-made weapons that could change everything

stories.text:
I'm currently working on a Movie Recommendation app and I don't wanna build on something that is generic and takes some likes and dislikes of users and show movies in that particular genre.

We might like a wide spectrum of movies based on the plot (or anything) of the movies so, if you guys could tell me what do you expect from a movie recommendations app it would be helping me a lot.
stories.title: What do you expect from a Movie / Show Recommendations app?
